name: A Patch to Appease
description:
A Patch to Appease

My submission for Mini Jam 89: Pumpkin, with the limitation of 'Based off a myth'!

In a once peaceful land, your gnomish village was a peaceful group, knowing only love, day in day out. That was until the Lord of the Pumpkins was awoken!

To keep the Lord of the Pumpkins at bay, your village must grow pumpkins for profit to give to the Lord, otherwise the entire land is doomed!

A time is given at the end to see how fast you appeased the lord, but it's just there for fun, play the game at your own pace :)

Controls

Left Mouse Click - All buttons on screen

Growing order:

  • Pick your seed from the bottom left of the screen and plant it in an open plot
  • Click the watering can then the seeds to water the seeds
  • Click the shovel then the pumpkins to harvest them
  • Use the cursor icon to buy new plots and finish the game (Also a secret sound effect :O)

TIP: Don't spend every bit of your pumpkoin on new plots, if you completely run out you'll have to restart!

Credit for assets used are included in the credits section of the game
